Disallow: /index.php?route=product/product*&manufacturer_id=

Disallow: /catalog
Disallow: /system

Disallow: /*&sort=
Disallow: /*?order=
Disallow: /*&order=

Disallow: /*&limit=
Disallow: /*?filter=
Disallow: /*&filter=
Disallow: /*?filter_name=
Disallow: /*&filter_name=
Disallow: /*?filter_sub_category=
Disallow: /*&filter_sub_category=
Disallow: /*?filter_description=
Disallow: /*&filter_description=
Disallow: /*?tracking=
Disallow: /*&tracking=
Disallow: /search
Disallow: /cart
Disallow: /my-account
Disallow: /wishlist

User-agent: Yandex
Disallow: /
